description: The Embassy of Canada to Qatar, in Doha requires cleaning services.

full_summary:
- **tender title**: Cleaning Services for the Embassy of Canada in Doha, Qatar
- **reference number**: CB-6452-86067581
- **solicitation number** : 23-223103
- **advertised date**: June 16th, 2023
- **closes on**: July 17th, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)
- 
The Embassy of Canada in Doha, Qatar is seeking a contractor to provide cleaning services. 

The Embassy is located on the 30th floor of a high-rise building. 

Successful bidder will need to provide a detailed floor plan of the facility to ensure a thorough cleaning service will be provided on a continuing basis. 

The Embassy operates under competitive bidding procedures and the contract will be awarded based on the lowest price. 

exporting opportunities will be opened to qualified contractors who participate in international bids. The contract is open to contractors who meet the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) terms. 

Some key highlights of the required contract are as follows: 

 - Cleaning services for a total area of approximately 19,000 square feet 
- Work will be undertaken on a weekly basis 
- Compliance with all Canadian laws and regulations is required
- Use of environmentally friendly products is encouraged
- Bidders are allowed to submit a single proposal for the four-year contract term 
- Standard provisions of the General Terms and Conditions for Goods and Services may also be applied.

The required documents can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6452/23-223103---cleaning-services---doha---rfp_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6452/23-223103---cleaning-services---doha---rfp_0.pdf) (cleaning services - RFP).
